edf_system_search_path.description: filesystem path where to load EDF files from

parallax_imagestore.description: shared filesystem path where to store/load images

parallax_mount_program.description: filesystem path to the utilty that handles shared images mounts

podman_module.description: podman module name to be used for running containers

podman_tmp_path.description: filesystem path where to store podman temporary files

runtime_path.description: filesystem path to OCI container runtime

tracking_tool.description: filesystem path to the tool used for tracking
